changeSet.author: gustavo
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tb_user( id bigserial NOT NULL, name varchar(250) NOT NULL, email varchar(250) NOT NULL, password varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("id") );
